item.title: CMU 15-445/645 NOTES
item.description: Lecture #01: Course Introduction and the Relational Model Relational Model The relational model defines a database abstraction based on relations to avoid maintenance overhead. Key tenets: Store database in simple data structures(relations). Physical storage left up to the DBMS implementation. Access data through high-level language, DBMS figures out best execution strategy. n-ary Relation = Table with n columns Relational Algebra: JOIN Databases are ubiquitous. Lecture #02: Advanced SQL SQL is

item.title: SQL
item.description: Difference between count() 参考🔗： What is the Difference Between COUNT(*), COUNT(1), COUNT(column name), and COUNT(DISTINCT column name)? 很不错的文章，果然还是看英文靠谱点。 The COUNT() function belongs to SQL’s aggregate functions. It counts the number of rows that satisfy the criteria defined in the parentheses. It does not return the rows

item.title: Redis
item.description: 官方文档： Redis documentation Redis Sentinel High availability with Redis Sentinel Redis Sentinel provides high availability for Redis when not using Redis Cluster. Running Sentinel However it is mandatory to use a configuration file when running Sentinel, as this file will be used by the system in order to save the current state that will be reloaded in case of restarts. Sentinel will simply refuse to start

item.title: The Missing Semester of Your CS Education
item.description: The Missing Semester of Your CS Education 🔗: The Missing Semester of Your CS Education Topic 1: The Shell The $ tells you that you are not the root user. item.title: DATABASE
item.description: Oracle Sequence序列 Oracle / PLSQL: Sequences (Autonumber) Oracle NEXTVAL function tips CREATE SEQUENCE 值得注意的几点： When a sequence number is generated, the sequence is incremented, independent of the transaction committing or rolling back. If two users concurrently increment the same sequence, then the sequence numbers each user acquires may have gaps, because sequence numbers are

item.title: CS 基础知识笔记
item.description: CS 基础知识的笔记，不算是总结性的笔记，只是曾经备忘录上记录下来的和对于自己陌生的点，或许应该保存到blog上，抑或是考试教育的一种印证。 CO 1
